bugs.description: Get a link to a package's bugs url.
bugs.none: This package has not set a bugs url. Check its [npm](https://npm.im/{0}) to see if they have something there.

docs.description: Get a link to a package's documentation.
docs.none: This package has not set a documentation url. Check its [npm](https://npm.im/{0}) to see if they have something there.

info.description: Get information about a package on npm.

registry-ping.description: Send a ping to an npm registry.
registry-ping.invalidReg: The registry url you provided ({0}) did not pass url validation.
registry-ping.noResponse: We didn't get a response from the registry.

repo.description: Get a link to a package's repository url.
repo.none: This package has not set a repository url. Check its [npm](https://npm.im/{0}) to see if they have something there.
